Download and play Snood now! hâ€‹ttps://apps.apple.com/us/app/snood/id878752504 


Danny welcomes Real Housewives of Atlanta star and Grammy-winning singer/songwriter Kandi Burruss to Everything Iconic. They discuss her writing of some of her biggest hits, the upcoming season of RHOA, winning The Masked Singer, and so much more.


WATCH the interview on YouTube at YouTube.com/DannyPellegrino1


PS Subscribe to Danny's spinoff podcast, A Very Merry Iconic Podcast, which is out now!


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
